DOC.brief_summary: A study investigate efficacy ONO-8539 acid-induced oesophageal hypersensitivity healthy male adult volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Investigate Effect ONO-8539 Acid-Induced Oesophageal Hypersensitivity Healthy Volunteers
DOC.detailed_description: This randomise , double-blind , placebo-controlled , two-period crossover study , investigate efficacy ONO-8539 acid-induced oesophageal hypersensitivity healthy male adult volunteer . Each subject randomise ONO-8539 placebo twice daily first treatment period alternate treatment second treatment period . Dosing period 15 day .
DOC.criteria: Healthy Caucasian male subject , age 1845 year inclusive , enter study . Subjects exclude motility disorder , able tolerate study procedure GI surgery condition would affect study result .
